comment:
I will stake my own life on this statement...
That lady Amber is a bonafide sociopath, through & through. Everything I've seen and heard about her, which I've now sat and watched hours of today , I've seen a mirror likeness of before. She is cold, calculating, methodical! Bitterness & resentment governs her every action and emotion. 
Johnny Depp was/IS in the fight of his life to escape her clutches, and I FULLY BELIEVE one of the comments he made, when he said, "He was scared to death and didn't know what to do." He said it because he realized he fell in love with pure evil and the only escape he had would be a never ending nightmare, which he's been living now for years!! He knew it, and I assure you, he foresaw the outcome he now fights with. 
We have not heard the last of Amber Heard. If we could ever a fly on the wall, or secretly record what her own sister has to say about her, THAT is where we'd find the real truth. Her family knows what she is and what she's capable of, but say nothing b/c they are trapped in her web too! I again stake my life on that fact!
Here is the absolute truth about what happens when your sociopath partner knows you've figured them out... YOU BECOME THEIR PUREST ENEMY & NOTHING IS HELD BACK FOR THEM TO DESTROY EVERYTHING THEY CAN ABOUT YOU! And I mean everything. 
Lucky for Johnny it only took him a year of marriage to figure it out, and get the fock out! I bet he knows he'll be picking up the pieces of this unholy terror, for a long long time to come!
author: Soup GDWinney

comment: The Australian Federal Government is still investigating Amber Heard for perjury over the dog smuggling. They are waiting for the court case to finish because there may be more evidence to come relating to their investigation. Perjury is a serious offence in Australia and carries a sentence of 14 years. Considering she lied to a judge in Queensland and he went easy on her with a fine of $1,000 and a one year good behaviour bond. Many Australia's and particularly politicians were outraged with the sense of entitlement and blatant disregard for our strict biodiversity laws. She made a mockery of our justice system, having government officials discuss the investigation in parliament is serious business! The next judge won't go easy on her and is more likely to make an example of her!
